layout.singingstanza: In a low dun -- geon, hope we had none; Tried to be -- lieve, but faith did -- n't come; God, our sky clear -- ing, Je -- sus ap -- pear -- ing, We by God were trans -- fused! We by God were trans -- fused! Pro -- pi -- ti -- a -- tion made by the blood, Je -- sus' re -- demp -- tion bought us for God! No con -- dem -- na -- tion, just -- i -- fi -- ca -- tion! We have peace to -- ward God! We have peace to -- ward God!

lyrics.stanza: Propitiation made by the blood, Jesus' redemption bought us for God! No condemnation, justification! We have peace toward God! We have peace toward God!
Now we're rejoicing, standing in grace, Oh hallelujah! Sin is erased! God, in us flowing, in our hearts growing, We are saved in His life! We are saved in His life!
